trans-unit.source: Represents an 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 8 位无符号整数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Byte> is an immutable value type that represents unsigned integers with values that range from 0 (which is represented by the <xref:System.Byte.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> constant) to 255 (which is represented by the <xref:System.Byte.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> constant).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte> 是不可变的值类型，表示无符号的整数，其范围从 0 的值 (这由<xref:System.Byte.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>常量) 到 255 (这由<xref:System.Byte.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>常量)。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework also includes a signed 8-bit integer value type, <xref:System.SByte>, which represents values that range from -128 to 127.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 还包括 8 位有符号的整数值类型， <xref:System.SByte>，它表示介于-128 到 127 之间的值。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a Byte Value
trans-unit.target: 实例化一个字节值

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Byte> value in several ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Byte>有几个方面的值：

trans-unit.source: You can declare a <xref:System.Byte> variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the <xref:System.Byte> data type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以声明<xref:System.Byte>变量并将其分配的范围内的整数值<xref:System.Byte>数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example declares two <xref:System.Byte> variables and assigns them values in this way.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例声明了两个<xref:System.Byte>变量并将它们分配在这种方式中的值。

trans-unit.source: You can assign a non-byte numeric value to a byte.
trans-unit.target: 可以将非字节的数字值分配给一个字节。

trans-unit.source: This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on.
trans-unit.target: 这是收缩转换，因此如果需要强制转换运算符在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的转换方法`Option Strict`上。

trans-unit.source: If the non-byte value is a <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, or <xref:System.Decimal> value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果非字节值为<xref:System.Single>， <xref:System.Double>，或<xref:System.Decimal>包括小数组件，其小数部分处理的值取决于编译器执行转换。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns several numeric values to <xref:System.Byte> variables.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例将分配到的几个数值<xref:System.Byte>变量。

trans-unit.source: You can call a method of the <xref:System.Convert> class to convert any supported type to a <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用的方法<xref:System.Convert>类能够将任何支持的类型到<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: This is possible because <xref:System.Byte> supports the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这是可能因为<xref:System.Byte>支持<xref:System.IConvertible>接口。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of <xref:System.Int32> values to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了数组的转换<xref:System.Int32>值复制到<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A> or <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A> method to convert the string representation of a <xref:System.Byte> value to a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A>或<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A>方法将转换的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Byte>值赋给<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 字符串可以包含十进制或十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用十进制和十六进制字符串分析操作。

trans-unit.source: Performing Operations on Byte Values
trans-unit.target: 对字节值执行操作

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Byte> type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, subtraction, negation, and unary negation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte>类型支持标准的数学运算，例如加法、 减法、 除法、 乘法、 减法、 求反和一元求反。

trans-unit.source: Like the other integral types, the <xref:System.Byte> type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators.
trans-unit.target: 与其他整数类型，类似<xref:System.Byte>类型还支持的按位`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左移位和右移位运算符。

trans-unit.source: You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two <xref:System.Byte> values, or you can call the <xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%2A> or <xref:System.Byte.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用标准数值运算符比较两个<xref:System.Byte>值，也可以调用<xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%2A>或<xref:System.Byte.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also call the members of the <xref:System.Math> class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调用的成员<xref:System.Math>类来执行各种数值操作，包括获取绝对值的数值的数字，计算商和整数除法运算的余数确定两个最大或最小值整数，获取数字的符号和舍入数。

trans-unit.source: Representing a Byte as a String
trans-unit.target: 表示作为字符串的一个字节

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Byte> type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte>类型提供对标准和自定义数字格式字符串的完全支持。

trans-unit.source: (For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) However, most commonly, byte values are represented as one-digit to three-digit values without any additional formatting, or as two-digit hexadecimal values.
trans-unit.target: (有关详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)但是，大多数情况下，字节值表示为一位到三位数字值不带任何其他格式，或作为两位数的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: To format a <xref:System.Byte> value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless <xref:System.Byte.ToString> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置格式<xref:System.Byte>值为一个不带前导零的整数字符串，您可以调用的无参数<xref:System.Byte.ToString>方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用"D"格式说明符，您还可以包含指定的数目的字符串表示形式中的前导零。

trans-unit.source: By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent a <xref:System.Byte> value as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用"X"格式说明符，您可以表示<xref:System.Byte>十六进制字符串形式的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example formats the elements in an array of <xref:System.Byte> values in these three ways.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在一个数组中的元素进行格式设置<xref:System.Byte>以下三种方式中的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also format a <xref:System.Byte> value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Byte%2CSystem.Int32%29> method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置格式<xref:System.Byte>通过调用十进制或十六进制字符串值作为二进制、 八进制<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Byte%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法并提供将基作为该方法的第二个参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用此方法以显示二进制、 八进制和十六进制表示形式的字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: Working with Non-Decimal Byte Values
trans-unit.target: 使用非十进制字节值

trans-unit.source: In addition to working with individual bytes as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with byte values, or work with byte arrays or with the binary or hexadecimal representations of byte values.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用作为十进制值单个字节时，你可能想要执行带字节值的按位运算，或对字节数组或字节值的二进制或十六进制表示起。

trans-unit.source: For example, overloads of the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method can convert each of the primitive data types to a byte array, and the <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger.ToByteArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method converts a <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger> value to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 例如，重载的<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可以将每个基元数据类型转换为字节数组和<xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger.ToByteArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将<xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger>为字节数组的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Byte> values are represented in 8 bits by their magnitude only, without a sign bit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte> 值以表示 8 位由它们的量，而无需符号位。

trans-unit.source: This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on <xref:System.Byte> values or when you work with individual bits.
trans-unit.target: 这是重要上执行按位运算时，需要注意<xref:System.Byte>值或当你处理的单个位进行运算。

trans-unit.source: In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行数字、 布尔值或对任何两个非十进制值的比较操作，这两个值都必须使用相同的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When an operation is performed on two <xref:System.Byte> values, the values share the same representation, so the result is accurate.
trans-unit.target: 当对两个执行操作<xref:System.Byte>值，值将共享相同的表示形式，因此结果为准确。

trans-unit.source: This is illustrated in the following example, which masks the lowest-order bit of a <xref:System.Byte> value to ensure that it is even.
trans-unit.target: 这一点在以下示例中，了屏蔽的最低顺序位<xref:System.Byte>值，以确保它为偶数。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, when you work with both unsigned and signed bits, bitwise operations are complicated by the fact that the <xref:System.SByte> values use sign-and-magnitude representation for positive values, and two's complement representation for negative values.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，当使用无符号和有符号位时，按位运算复杂的这一事实，<xref:System.SByte>值使用符号数值表示法正值，和负数值的补数表示形式.

trans-unit.source: In order to perform a meaningful bitwise operation, the values must be converted to two equivalent representations, and information about the sign bit must be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行有意义的按位运算，值必须转换为等效的两个表示形式，并且必须保留符号位有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example does this to mask out bits 2 and 4 of an array of 8-bit signed and unsigned values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例这样做是为了出 2 和 4 的 8 位有符号和无符号值的数组的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: All members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的所有成员都是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，看起来要修改实例状态的成员返回使用新值初始化的新实例。

trans-unit.source: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 作为与任何其他类型，读取和写入到共享的变量，其中包含此类型的实例必须受使用锁来确保的线程安全性。

trans-unit.target: 将此实例与指定的对象或 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 进行比较，并返回二者相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.IComparable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface and performs slightly better than the <xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现<xref:System.IComparable%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口，并且执行效果略好于<xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法因为它不具有要转换`value`对对象的参数。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a <xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%2A> method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于您的编程语言，它可能会对代码<xref:System.Byte.CompareTo%2A>其中的参数类型具有较少的位的方法 （为较窄） 比实例类型。

trans-unit.source: This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是因为某些编程语言中执行的隐式的扩大转换，它表示具有任意数量的位的实例作为类型参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the instance type is <xref:System.Int32> and the parameter type is <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设实例类型是<xref:System.Int32>和参数类型是<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an <xref:System.Int32>, then generates a <xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that compares the values of the <xref:System.Int32> instance and the <xref:System.Int32> parameter representation.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft C# 编译器生成的指令来表示形式的参数值<xref:System.Int32>，然后生成<xref:System.Int32.CompareTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>比较的值的方法<xref:System.Int32>实例和<xref:System.Int32>参数表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types.
trans-unit.target: 请查阅你的编程语言的文档，以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式的扩大转换。

trans-unit.source: Represents the largest possible value of a <see cref="T:System.Byte" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 的最大可能值。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 255 (hexadecimal 0xFF).
trans-unit.target: 此常量的值为 255 (十六进制 0xFF)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Byte.MaxValue> field to screen variable inputs for values that are outside the range of possible byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Byte.MaxValue>字段为变量输入中筛选可能的字节值的范围之外的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the smallest possible value of a <see cref="T:System.Byte" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 的最小可能值。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此常量的值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Byte.MinValue> field to screen variable inputs for values that are outside the range of possible byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Byte.MinValue>字段为变量输入中筛选可能的字节值的范围之外的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" /> style.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" /> 样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A byte value that is equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节值，它与 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的数相等。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter contains a number of the form:
trans-unit.target: `s`参数包含一个数字的窗体：

trans-unit.source: [ws][sign]digits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][sign]digits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional positive or negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的正整数或负号。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数被解释使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 除了字节值的十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。

trans-unit.source: (If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>.) To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use either the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: (如果登录不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>。)若要显式定义可出现在的样式元素`s`，可以使用两种<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化针对当前系统区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting information of some other culture, use the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析使用的格式信息的一些其他区域性的字符串，请使用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to convert a string value into a byte value using the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将字符串值转换为字节值使用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The resulting byte value is then displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 然后向控制台显示生成的字节值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is not of the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the style specified by <c>style</c>.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用由 <c>style</c> 指定的样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，用于指示可出现在 <c>s</c> 中的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一个典型值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式的数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />。

trans-unit.source: A byte value that is equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节值，它与 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的数相等。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空白或正号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是中的位标志的组合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 根据值`style`、`s`参数可能包括以下元素：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Or, if `style` includes <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:

trans-unit.source: [ws]hexdigits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws]hexdigits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of s if style includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空格可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或如果样式包括 s 末尾<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的货币符号。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中的位置由<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>当前区域性的属性。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 当前区域性的货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 可选的正号。

trans-unit.source: (The method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException> if a negative sign is present in `s`.) The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: (该方法将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>如果中存在一个负号，则`s`。)符号可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 9 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的小数点符号。

trans-unit.source: The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 当前区域性的小数点符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *fractional_digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional_digits*

trans-unit.source: One or more occurrences of the digit 0.
trans-unit.target: 数字 0 的一个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数可以出现在`s`才`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The e or E character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: E 或 E 字符，它指示的值用在指数记数法表示。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数可以表示指数记数法的数字，如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *hexdigits*
trans-unit.target: *hexdigits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 F.的十六进制数字

trans-unit.source: A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字的字符串 (它对应于<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式) 总是可以分析成功。

trans-unit.source: Most of the remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string.
trans-unit.target: 其余的大多数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员控件可能但不是要求必须包含在此输入字符串中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指示个别<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员影响中可能存在的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: Non-composite NumberStyles values
trans-unit.target: 非复合 NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 除数字之外的 s 中允许的元素

trans-unit.source: Decimal digits only.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The *.*
and *fractional_digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 和*fractional_digits*元素。

trans-unit.source: However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or an <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 但是， *fractional_digits*必须包含仅一个或多个数字 0 或<xref:System.OverflowException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*开头的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*结尾的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear before *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号之前可以出现*数字*。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear after *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号可以出现后*数字*。

trans-unit.source: Although this flag is supported, the use of parentheses in `s` results in an <xref:System.OverflowException>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管支持此标志，在中的使用括号`s`导致<xref:System.OverflowException>。

trans-unit.source: Although the group separator symbol can appear in `s`, it can be preceded by only one or more 0 digits.
trans-unit.target: 虽然组分隔符符号可以出现在`s`，则可以仅一个或多个数字 0 前面添加。

trans-unit.source: The *$* element.
If the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用标志，`s`必须是不带前缀的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "F3" parses successfully, but "0xF3" does not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"F3"分析成功，但是"0xF3"却没有。

trans-unit.source: The only other flags that can be combined with it are <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 仅其他标志，可以与它组合为<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration includes a composite number style, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>, that includes both white space flags.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举包含复合数字样式， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中包含两个空白标志。)

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化针对当前系统区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: To use the formatting information of some other culture, call the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的格式信息的一些其他区域性，调用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses string representations of `Byte` values with the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例分析的字符串表示形式之间实现`Byte`值与<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The current culture for the example is en-US.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的当前区域性为 EN-US。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.

trans-unit.source: (If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>.) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: (如果登录不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>。)若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在区域性特定格式设置信息`s`，使用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object supplied by `provider`.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>通过提供对象`provider`。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation such as a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>如实现<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数提供区域性特定信息在分析中使用。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `provider` 为 `null`，则使用当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses string representations of `Byte` values with the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例分析的字符串表示形式之间实现`Byte`值与<xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is not of the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 表示小于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the style specified by <c>style</c>.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用由 <c>style</c> 指定的样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，用于指示可出现在 <c>s</c> 中的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一个典型值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific information about the format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>s</c> 的格式的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: If <c>provider</c> is <see langword="null" />, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>provider</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式和区域性特定格式的数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />。

trans-unit.source: A byte value that is equivalent to the number contained in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节值，它与 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的数相等。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空白或正号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是中的位标志的组合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 根据值`style`、`s`参数可能包括以下元素：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Or, if the `style` parameter includes <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果`style`参数包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:

trans-unit.source: [ws]hexdigits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws]hexdigits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空格可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的货币符号。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method of the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中的位置由<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 可选的正号。

trans-unit.source: (The method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException> if a negative sign is present in `s`.) The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: (该方法将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>如果中存在一个负号，则`s`。)符号可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 9 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的小数点符号。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域性的小数点符号`provider`可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *fractional_digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional_digits*

trans-unit.source: One or more occurrences of the digit 0.
trans-unit.target: 数字 0 的一个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数可以出现在`s`才`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The e or E character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: E 或 E 字符，它指示的值用在指数记数法表示。

trans-unit.source: The s parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: S 参数可以表示指数记数法的数字，如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *hexdigits*
trans-unit.target: *hexdigits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 F.的十六进制数字

trans-unit.source: A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字的字符串 (它对应于<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式) 总是可以分析成功。

trans-unit.source: Most of the remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string.
trans-unit.target: 其余的大多数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员控件可能但不是要求必须包含在此输入字符串中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指示个别<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员影响中可能存在的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: Non-composite NumberStyles values
trans-unit.target: 非复合 NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 除数字之外的 s 中允许的元素

trans-unit.source: Decimal digits only.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The *.*
and *fractional_digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 和*fractional_digits*元素。

trans-unit.source: However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or an <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 但是， *fractional_digits*必须包含仅一个或多个数字 0 或<xref:System.OverflowException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*开头的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*结尾的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear before *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号之前可以出现*数字*。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear after *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号可以出现后*数字*。

trans-unit.source: Although this flag is supported, the use of parentheses in `s` results in an <xref:System.OverflowException>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管支持此标志，在中的使用括号`s`导致<xref:System.OverflowException>。

trans-unit.source: Although the group separator symbol can appear in `s`, it can be preceded by only one or more 0 digits.
trans-unit.target: 虽然组分隔符符号可以出现在`s`，则可以仅一个或多个数字 0 前面添加。

trans-unit.source: The *$* element.
If the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用标志，`s`必须是不带前缀的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "F3" parses successfully, but "0xF3" does not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"F3"分析成功，但是"0xF3"却没有。

trans-unit.source: The only other flags that can be present in `style` are <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 仅其他标志可出现在`style`是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration has a composite number style, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>, that includes both white space flags.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举具有复合数字样式<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中包含两个空白标志。)

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation, such as a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，如<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the value of this object, which consists of a sequence of digits that range from 0 to 9 with no leading zeroes.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的值的字符串表示形式，由一系列从 0 到 9 之间的数字组成，不包含前导零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G") and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the thread current culture.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G") 和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>线程的当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: To define the formatting of the <xref:System.Byte> value's string representation, call the <xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义的格式设置<xref:System.Byte>值的字符串表示形式，请调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To define both the format specifiers and culture used to create the string representation of a <xref:System.Byte> value, call the <xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义格式说明符和区域性用于创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Byte>值时，请调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the thread current culture, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays an array of byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示一个字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Byte.ToString> method is not called explicitly in the example.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Byte.ToString>不在示例中显式调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is called implicitly, because of the use of the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它是隐式调用，因为使用了[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息将当前 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the value of this object in the format specified by the <paramref name="provider" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此对象值的字符串表示形式，采用 <paramref name="provider" /> 参数所指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G").
trans-unit.target: 返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是一个对象，实现<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>提供此方法返回的字符串的格式的区域性特定信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表要使用其格式设置规则的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，其中包含特定的数字格式设置信息，此值。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null` or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the thread current culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象不能从获取`provider`，返回值的格式使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>线程的当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about the thread current culture, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates an array of byte values and displays each of them to the console by calling the <xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29> method with different format providers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例循环的字节数组值，并向控制台显示每个通过调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29>使用不同的格式提供程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: A numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: 一个数值格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式将当前 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object, formatted as specified by the <paramref name="format" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 按照 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 参数指定的方式进行格式设置的当前 <paramref name="format" /> 对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters.
trans-unit.target: 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G").
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this function is formatted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the thread current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此函数的返回值格式都是使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>线程的当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about the thread current culture, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To provide formatting information for cultures other than the current culture, call the <xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供区域性而非当前区域性的格式设置信息，请调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Byte> value and displays it to the console using each of the supported standard format strings and a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例初始化<xref:System.Byte>值并将其显示到控制台中使用的每个受支持的标准格式字符串和一个自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The example is run with en-US as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EN-US 时的情况下，该示例运行与当前的区域性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> includes an unsupported specifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 包括不受支持的说明符。

trans-unit.source: Supported format specifiers are listed in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: “备注”部分中列出了受支持的格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: 标准或自定义的数值格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和区域性特定格式信息将当前 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> object, formatted as specified by the <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="provider" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 按照 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 和 <paramref name="format" /> 参数指定的方式进行格式设置的当前 <paramref name="provider" /> 对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method formats a <xref:System.Byte> value in a specified format of a specified culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法格式<xref:System.Byte>采用指定区域性的指定格式的值。

trans-unit.source: To format a number by using the default ("G") format of the current culture, call the <xref:System.Byte.ToString> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用当前区域性的默认值 ("G") 格式来格式化数字，调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString>方法。

trans-unit.source: To format a number by using a specified format of the current culture, call the <xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过使用当前区域性的指定的格式将数字格式，调用<xref:System.Byte.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters.
trans-unit.target: 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value of this method is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G").
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，此方法返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是一个对象，实现<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>提供此方法返回的字符串的格式的区域性特定信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表要使用其格式设置规则的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，其中包含特定的数字格式设置信息，此值。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null` or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the thread current culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象不能从获取`provider`，返回值的格式使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>线程的当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about the thread current culture, see <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the standard "N" format string and four different <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects to display the string representation of a byte value to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用标准的"N"格式字符串和第四个不同<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>要向控制台显示的字符串表示形式的字节值的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> includes an unsupported specifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 包括不受支持的说明符。

trans-unit.source: Supported format specifiers are listed in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: “备注”部分中列出了受支持的格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Tries to convert the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" /> style.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" /> 样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> value equivalent to the number contained in <c>s</c> if the conversion succeeded, or zero if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，如果转换成功，则包含与 <c>s</c> 中所包含的数字等效的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 值；如果转换失败，则包含零。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized; any value originally supplied in <c>result</c> will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即进行传递；最初在 <c>result</c> 中提供的任何值都会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Tries to convert the string representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="s" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails and the method returns `false` if the `s` parameter is not in the correct format, if it is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or if it represents a number less than <xref:System.Byte.MinValue> or greater than <xref:System.Byte.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 则转换失败，并且该方法返回`false`如果`s`参数不是格式正确，如果它是`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或如果它表示的数字小于<xref:System.Byte.MinValue>或大于<xref:System.Byte.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is similar to the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, except that <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29> does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法类似于是<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，只不过<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29>不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the following form:
trans-unit.target: `s`参数应为以下形式的数字的字符串表示：

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional positive sign, as specified by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 可选的正号，由指定<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>当前区域性的属性。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of decimal digits that range from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 范围从 0 到 9 的十进制数字的序列。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer> style.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数被解释使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer>样式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 除了字节值的十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。

trans-unit.source: (If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>.) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: (如果登录不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>。)若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在区域性特定格式设置信息`s`，使用<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>为当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将解释中的所有位`s`为十进制数字的参数。

trans-unit.source: To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析的字符串表示形式的十六进制数，请调用<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Byte%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29> method with a number of different string values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Byte%40%29>与大量的不同字符串值的方法。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the style specified by <c>style</c>.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用由 <c>style</c> 指定的样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，用于指示可出现在 <c>s</c> 中的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一个典型值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>s</c> 的区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: If <c>provider</c> is <see langword="null" />, the thread current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>provider</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the 8-bit unsigned integer value equivalent to the number contained in <c>s</c> if the conversion succeeded, or zero if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，如果转换成功，则包含与 <c>s</c> 中所包含的数字等效的 8 位无符号整数值；如果转换失败，则包含零。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails if the <c>s</c> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, is not of the correct format, or represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>s</c> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />、格式不正确，或者表示小于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的数，则转换失败。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized; any value originally supplied in <c>result</c> will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即进行传递；最初在 <c>result</c> 中提供的任何值都会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式和区域性特定格式的数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="s" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A> method is like the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A> method, except the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A> method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A>方法就像是<xref:System.Byte.Parse%2A>方法，除了<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A>方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object supplied by the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>通过提供对象`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The style parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 样式参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空白或正号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是中的位标志的组合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 根据值`style`、`s`参数可能包括以下元素：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Or, if the `style` parameter includes <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果`style`参数包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:

trans-unit.source: [ws]hexdigits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws]hexdigits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ( [ and ] ) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 （[和]） 中是可选元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of s if style includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空格可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或如果样式包括 s 末尾<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的货币符号。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method of the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中的位置由<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 可选的正号。

trans-unit.source: (The parse operation fails if a negative sign is present in `s`.) The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: (分析操作失败，如果一个负号位于`s`。)符号可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 9 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的小数点符号。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域性的小数点符号`provider`可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *fractional_digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional_digits*

trans-unit.source: One or more occurrences of the digit 0.
trans-unit.target: 数字 0 的一个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数可以出现在`s`才`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The e or E character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: E 或 E 字符，它指示的值用在指数记数法表示。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数可以表示指数记数法的数字，如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *hexdigits*
trans-unit.target: *hexdigits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 F.的十六进制数字

trans-unit.source: A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> style) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字的字符串 (它对应于<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式) 总是可以分析成功。

trans-unit.source: Most of the remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string.
trans-unit.target: 其余的大多数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员控件可能但不是要求必须包含在此输入字符串中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指示个别<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员影响中可能存在的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: Non-composite NumberStyles values
trans-unit.target: 非复合 NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 除数字之外的 s 中允许的元素

trans-unit.source: Decimal digits only.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The *.*
and *fractional_digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 和*fractional_digits*元素。

trans-unit.source: However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但是， *fractional_digits*仅一个或多个数字 0 或该方法将返回必须组成`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the <xref:System.Byte> data type without a non-zero, fractional component.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`表示一个数字指数记数法时，它必须表示的范围内的整数<xref:System.Byte>不带非零小数部分的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*开头的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*结尾的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear before *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号之前可以出现*数字*。

trans-unit.source: A positive sign can appear after *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 正号可以出现后*数字*。

trans-unit.source: Although this flag is supported, the method returns `false` if parentheses are present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 尽管支持此标志，该方法返回`false`如果括号都位于`s`。

trans-unit.source: Although the group separator symbol can appear in `s`, it can be preceded by only one or more 0 digits.
trans-unit.target: 虽然组分隔符符号可以出现在`s`，则可以仅一个或多个数字 0 前面添加。

trans-unit.source: The *$* element.
If the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用标志，`s`必须是不带前缀的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "F3" parses successfully, but "0xF3" does not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"F3"分析成功，但是"0xF3"却没有。

trans-unit.source: The only other flags that can be present in `style` are <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 仅其他标志可出现在`style`是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration has a composite number style, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>, that includes both white space flags.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举具有复合数字样式<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中包含两个空白标志。)

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation, such as a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，如<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象提供的格式的区域性特定信息`s`。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Byte%40%29> method with a number of different string values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Byte%40%29>与大量的不同字符串值的方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a combination of <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber" /> 值的组合。
